attributes.action: GRANT THE PEOPLE OF ENGLAND A REFERUNDUM ON ENGLISH INDEPENDENCE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Scots and the Welsh have been offered the opportunity to take part in a vote on whether they want to withdraw from the United Kingdom. However this, as is many things, is denied to the English. I am asking as an Englishman the same rights as those bestowed on the Scots and the Welsh.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
